title: Lux Skin - Cheerleader Lux
body:
Riot, its been 2 years since you guys have been saying that lux needs a skin that isnt military styled, such as imperial, commando and steel legion lux. Here is an idea by me:
Cheerleader Lux:
Model - Lux can wear a crop top with a short skirt with sneakers. (what a regular cheerleader would wear).
 - she can hold pom poms.
 - Her hair can be untied and fairly long
Dance - She can do a dance routine while cheering for demacia.
Laugh -  Same as default laugh.
Back to base - She can be on a grandstand cheering and dancing.

I honestly dont know how the abilities can be, but i guess her doing a back flip or something when she ults can be pretty cool.

replies.body:
Why hold pom poms when she uses a wand?
Wouldn't a "spirit stick" be more appropriate.

ya its been a long time thou but they r trying to create a new skin for her
{{champion:99}}
I like the [void lux](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7CpLDUgbcoY) concept better. Cheerleader lux would be overly sexualised and I think there are already enough skins that do that.
